aiReason: While a unique and timely Hacker News topic, its direct relevance to Lman's core expertise (AI/LLM, Web3, Startup ecosystem, Privacy tech) is extremely low. It would require a significant abstract leap to connect to business value relevant to his audience.
suggestedAngle: Acknowledge the curiosity of such a niche site gaining Hacker News attention. Frame it as an outlier case study in online longevity or deep niche content, but critically highlight its limited applicability for building scalable tech businesses or understanding current industry trends Lman typically covers. Contrast it with the ephemeral nature of many tech trends Lman critiques.
draftTweet: Ian's Shoelace Site on HN front page. A fascinating, if irrelevant, case study in internet longevity. While it proves deep niche expertise can endure, it offers little for building scalable tech businesses. We must distinguish between internet curiosities and actionable business insights.
